attributes.action: Re-introduce deposits on cans and bottles in order to cut down on litter in the countryside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our roadsides are a disgrace with disgarded rubbish.  One positive step would be to charge a deposit on cans and bottles as was the case years ago.  We should be ashamed of the filthy state of our countryside.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Re-introduce deposits on cans and bottles in order to cut down on litter in the countryside."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11138.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/litter/
